_header: Saint Katherine of noble kin came by old daw
Subjects: saints’ lives; Katherine of Alexandria, saint, life of
Bibliographic Ghosts: Southwell, Southwell Cathedral Library 7, ff. 175-89: prose.
_description: Life of St. Katharine of Alexandria in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEynte katerine of noble kunne com bi olde daweHire fader kyng hire
                    moder quene boþe of olde lawe…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou ihesu crist vor þe suete loue of seynt
                    katerineȝeue ous þe Ioie of heuene & schulde ous fram helle
                    pyne

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint caterine of nobil cinne come by olde dawehere fadir king he
                    modir quene in þe olde lawe…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Nouȝ Ihesu for þe swete loue of seint
                    cateryneȜif vs þe ioye of heuene & cheld vs fram helle
                    pyne

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Katerine of noble kunne com bi olde daweHir ffader kyng hir
                    Modur qwene boþe of þe olde lawe…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now Ihesu for þe swete loue of seinte KateryneȜif
                    vs þe Ioye of heuene and schild vs from helle pyne. A.M.E.N.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEinte Katerine of noble kunne cam bi olde daweHire fader was king
                    hire moder Quyene boþe of þe olde lawe…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Graunti us þe Ioye of heuene and schilde us fram helle
                    pineAmen amen segge we alle for is holie tyme
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 92-101.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Katerine of noble kyn Com bi olde sawehire fadur king hire
                    moder quen Boþe of þe olde lawe…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Nou Ihesu Crist for þe suete loue of seinte
                    Katerineȝiue vs þe Ioye of heuene & Kepe vs fro helle
                    pyne
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodRawPoe225.First Lines:
When sche was brouȝt be forn hym he sayde wel come fayr
                    damyselþou hast ben in ful heuy pace in bondes of yryn & of
                    stel…
BodRawPoe225.Last Lines:
…þat we alle may in heuyn blys with outen ende dwellen &
                    beþat þis holy mayden seynt katerine is Amen amen say alle
                    we

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Sayne kateryn þe maiden swete come of noble kyndeHir fadre was
                    kynge hir modre was qwene as we in story fyndeKynge Costus hir fadre hight
                    he sett hir ȝonge to loreTil sho couthe þe seuene arses þat
                    heghe scienceȝ wore…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…Now ihesu for þe swete lufe of þi dere spouse
                    KaterineBrynge vs al þat heuene blisse & shilde vs fro hell
                    pyne

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Katerine of noble kyn ycome was by olde daweHure ffader was
                    kyng hure moder queene boþe of þe olde lawe…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now Ihesu ffor þe swete loue of þe holy mayde
                    KaterineȜif vs þe ioye of heuene and schulde vs ffram helle
                    pyne

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint kateryne of noble kynne cam by þulke dayhire fader was
                    king hire moder was quene boþ of þe olde lay…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…Ihesu for þe swete loue of seint katerineȜyue ous
                    þe ioie of heuene & schulde ous fram helle pyne

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint katerine of noble kunne com bi olde dauehire fader king here moþer quene boþe of þe olde laue…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou ihesu for þe suete loue of seinte katerineȝif ous þe ioie of heuen & schulde ous fram helle pine
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum lxxxiiii” added to right margin by later hand (f. 197).

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEint katerine of noble kunne com bi holde daweIr vader kinge ir modir quene boþe of þe olde lawe…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Nou ihesu crist vor þe swete loue of seint katerineȝuf ous þe ioie of heuene & sschulde ous fram helle pine

BLEge2891.First Lines: SEin katerine of noble kunne come bi olde daweHure fader kyng hure moder quene boþe of þe olde lawe…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …Nou iesu for þe swete loue of seinte katerineþif us Ȝe ioie of heuene and ssuld us fram helle pine

BLHar2277.First Lines: SEinte katerine of noble cunne com bi olde daweHire fader kyng hire moder quene boþe of olde lawe…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …Noou ihesu crist for þe swete loue of Seinte katerineȜyue ous þe ioye of heuene & schulde ous fram helle pine

BLSto949.First Lines: Seynt katerine of noble kunne cam by olde daweHere fader was king her moder quene boþe of þe olde lawe…
BLSto949.Last Lines: …Ihesu crist for þe swete loue of seynt katerineȝiue vs þe swete ioiȝe of heuene & schilde vs fram helle pyne

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt kateryne of noble kynne com by olde daweHir fader was kyng
                    hir moder was quene boþe of olde lawe…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Ihesu for þe swete love of saynt kateryneȜeve vs
                    þe swet ioye of heuen & shylde vs fro helle pyne Amen

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seyn Kateryne of noble kynne cam by þe olde daweHer fader was
                    kyng her modere quene be þe olde lawe…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Now Ihesu for þe swete loue of seint Kateryneȝeue
                    vs þe Ioye of heuene and kepe vs fro helle pyne. Amen.
